summary: DOD has struggled for decades to modernize its business systems, including its travel system. In 2023, DOD abandoned an initiative to replace its existing travel system, raising concerns about the effectiveness of its business process reforms. We reviewed DOD's efforts to modernize its travel and other systems. We found it hasn't fully addressed leading practices like establishing lead offices to oversee the efforts or ensuring...
title: DOD Systems Modernization: Further Action Needed to Improve Travel and Other Business Systems
